item.title: Report X-2024101276
item.description:
Report X-2024101276

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-11
  • City: TULSA
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DRIVER NOTICED A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THEIR PACKAGE CAR. THEN PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE INSIDE A PLASTIC BAG AND GAVE THE PACKAGE TO THE METRO CENTER CLERK. THE CLERK CALLED FOR A RESPONDER WHO TOOK THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA.
